thread.title: Comview to Feature Latest Mobility Management Solutions at AirWatch Connect
thread.title_full: Comview to Feature Latest Mobility Management Solutions at AirWatch Connect

author: Kevin Simms
title: Comview to Feature Latest Mobility Management Solutions at AirWatch Connect
text:
Comview, a premier provider of integrated fixed/wireless telecom expense management (TEM) and call accounting software and services, announced that it is looking forward to sponsoring the upcoming AirWatch Connect conference to be held September 21-24, 2015 in Atlanta, Georgia. “This will be our third time sponsoring the leading enterprise mobility event,” shared John Perri, Comview Founder and CEO. “We’ve found the Mobility Expo to be a great forum to meet with new prospects and existing customers to share the latest developments in our wireless mobility management solution, including the bi-directional integration with AirWatch by VMware enterprise mobility management (EMM).”
Before the unique two-way integration between Comview and AirWatch was introduced in 2013, EMM and TEM typically co-existed in organizations as independent applications with separate management and reporting tools. But since the integration, enterprises can manage and report on all of their corporate-liable and BYOD devices, users, expenses and security from a single web interface while gaining valuable new insights and functionality from combined data.
Among the benefits enterprises experience from the integrated solution are simplified management, streamlined processes, better EMM utilization through automated enrollment, and the ability to monitor roaming and adjust rate plans to minimize charges. Organizations also gain valuable management insights through a variety of contextual reports that intelligently combine data from carriers and corporate feeds with AirWatch information for a holistic view of the enterprise wireless environment.
Those interested in learning about Comview’s telecom management solutions and how they work with AirWatch are invited to visit booth 403 of the Mobility Expo from September 21-23 or on the web at http://www.comviewcorp.com .
About Comview Corporation
Comview provides fully integrated Telecom Expense Management (TEM), Wireless Mobility Management (WMM) and Call Accounting solutions backed by industry-leading customer service. The company’s cloud-based, unified software suite allows companies to easily manage all telecom usage and assets from a single intuitive interface, including: Invoice Management, Wireless Management (with BYOD and MDM integration), Audit & Optimization, Call Accounting, IT Asset Management, Procurement and more. A managed service/BPO approach and “customer for life” philosophy provides customers with the highest level of service and support and sustainable ROI. Comview’s services are used by major organizations throughout the U.S. and abroad. For additional information, visit Comview at http://www.comviewcorp.com .
